      • sendTransactions

        @RequestMapping(value="/send/transactions",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public JSONResponse sendTransactions(@RequestParam(value="transaction")
                                                                                                                                                                          String transaction,
                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="sourceId")
                                                                                                                                                                          String sourceId,
                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="destinationId")
                                                                                                                                                                          String destinationId,
                                                                                                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                                                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Method to create a transaction by sending a request using transactions and account details
        Parameters:
        transaction - given to represent transaction details needed to create a transaction
        sourceId - given as the transaction source to create a transaction
        destinationId - given as the transaction destination to create a transaction
        response - given to set response type for a request
        request - given to set request type
        Returns:
        JSON response relative to the status of the action
